title: Freelance Night Room Producer - Sports Media
text: Make Your Passion Your Career. â„¢ Work In Sports. Region Map Here is the job that interests you: Freelance Night Room Producer Posted/Updated: 10-16-2015 Brief Job Description: Job includes working the hours of 8:00 p.m. to 5:00 a.m., supervising multiple audio and video Mastering sessions and ensuring that all promos have the appropriate tags. Verifies that all elements needed to complete the edit and audio sessions are available.   Since your site launched in 2000, WorkInSports.com has been the go to place for USA Baseball when we are looking to fill full-time openings and internships. Your reputation throughout the sports industry as a vital tool for job seekers and employers is well deserved. Thanks again! David Perkins
